name: Venusaur
evolution: Venusaur evolves from Ivysaur at level 32. It can mega evolve into Mega Venusaur using the Venusaurite.

name: Charizard
evolution: Butterfree evolves from Metapod at level 10 and is the final evolution of Caterpie.

name: Butterfree
evolution: Charizard evolves from Charmeleon starting at level 36. It is the final form of Charmander.

name: Beedrill
evolution: Beedrill is the final evolution of Weedle and evolves from Kakuna at level 10. Beedrill gains a Mega Evolution in Omega Ruby and Alpha Sapphire.

name: Fearow
evolution: Fearow evolves from Spearow at level 20.

name: Nidoqueen
evolution: Nidoqueen is the evolved form of a Nidorina by use of a Moon Stone, and is the final form of a Nidoran.

name: Venomoth
evolution: Venomoth is the evolved form of Venonat as of level 31.

name: Wigglytuff
evolution: Wigglytuff is the evolved form of Jigglypuff by the use of a Moon Stone. Wigglytuff is the final form of Igglybuff.

name: Jynx
evolution: Jynx is the evolved form of Smoochum as of level 30.
